review_text: Probably the best available today, but, certainly not like the old metal ones. It fits where and how I want it to go and will do the job.It's got some sharp plastic edges on the inside. Sliced a finger reaching in to slide the side panels to fit.Low and medium speeds don't move much air and the small motor whines a bit on high. Fortunately I don't have to be in the room with it when it's on high.It does a much better job than the Holmes dual window fan I was using but I do long for the old metal King Air 20" I had years ago. That was a window fan.
summary: Probably the best available today, but,
product_name: Lasko #2155A Electrically Reversible Window Fan, 16 Inches
